mapper.sql: id, uid, report_type, report_time, state, article_type, article_id
mapper.select: select * from tbl_report order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_report (uid, report_type, report_time, state, article_type, article_id, content) values (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reportType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=BIT}, #{articleType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

id,

content,

mapper.update:
update tbl_report
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
report_type = #{reportType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
report_time = #{reportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=BIT},
article_type = #{articleType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
